review: This is a piece of junk. I bought it and then a month after it was no longer returnable it stopped working. I have a ROKU on another TV that has been working flawlessly for 7 years. I will replace Fire TV with a new ROKU box for half the price, which will hopefully be as reliable as the earlier model that is still in use.

review: The device works very well and I would give it 5 stars, but I was not aware that everything we would like to watch there is a charge. I thought that amazon Prime got everything free.  From the advertisement for Fire TV that is what we were to get. Instead there is a charge for TV shows that we missed when they first aired. The device works fine it is just not what we expected for programming.
